WorkItem.Description: When you try to add this enchantment to shoulders, always is added Greater Inscription of Vengeance instead, just the upper one. Same stats for both, but the name is incorrect.

Comments.Message: Not really a bug, just an oddity in WoW's spell data. It really is the same enchant.

This was actually a bug, now fixed (2.2.14 will not have this issue when it is released)

The item Greater Inscription of Vengeance is ITEM:28888, casts spell SPELL:35417 which applies permanent item enchantment PIE:2986

The item Lesser Inscription of the Axe is ITEM:44131, casts spell SPELL:59929 which applies permanent item enchantment PIE:3875

In the Rawr database, Lesser Inscription of the Axe was marked as having the wrong permanent item enchantment (PIE) ID. The same was true for Lesser Inscription of the Pinnacle. Because Rawr stores the PIE ID, not the name, it was showing the name from the first enchant it found with that PIE ID.
